hero.title: DESIGN AND ARCHITECTURE STUDIO
hero.description: We create architecture and interiors that inspire and make life more comfortable

about.title: About Us
about.description1: We are an architectural studio where creative possibilities and functionality come together, creating spaces that inspire and transform everyday life.
about.description2: We focus on developing solutions for residential and commercial properties that are not only aesthetically pleasing but also practical. Our team of professionals strives for excellence in every project.
about.description3: Each project is a unique journey that begins with understanding your needs and ends with the creation of a space that exceeds your expectations.

creativePath.title: Creative Path
creativePath.name: Dmitry Arkadyevich Kefkhayants
creativePath.description1: I was born in 1988 in Tashkent. In 2005, I graduated from school and enrolled in TASI in the Faculty of Architectural Environment Design. I graduated in 2009 with one of the highest scores.
creativePath.description2: In 2008, I won first place at the International Architectural Competition MACCA - 1st place (diploma) in Minsk, Belarus.
creativePath.description3: I revealed my charisma and talent in 2006 when I first performed on stage. Winning first place in 2008, I became known among professionals.
creativePath.description4: In 2009, after winning an international competition, I gained recognition not only in Russia but also abroad.
creativePath.description5: In 2010, I became a jury member at international competitions, and in 2012, the chief judge at the world championship.
creativePath.description6: Today, I continue to inspire millions of people worldwide, sharing my experience and knowledge.
creativePath.description7: I received my first job and project in 2009 at the age of 21, and since then, I have been dedicated to architecture and design.
creativePath.description8: Currently, I have founded my own architecture and design studio to realize all the experience and potential accumulated over the years.

projects.title: Architectural Projects
projects.description: We create architecture that harmoniously combines aesthetics, functionality, and innovative technologies. Our studio’s portfolio includes unique projects for residential, commercial, and public spaces, designed with modern trends and our clients’ individual needs in mind.

items.name: Modern Residential Complex
items.short_description: A state-of-the-art residential complex with sustainable design.
items.description:
This project features innovative architectural solutions.
It prioritizes eco-friendly materials and energy efficiency.

items.name: Commercial Hub
items.short_description: A dynamic commercial space for businesses.
items.description:
Designed for functionality and aesthetics.
Incorporates modern technology for smart operations.

items.title: Innovative Architecture Trends
items.description: An article exploring the latest trends in sustainable architecture.

items.title: Designing the Future
items.description: A feature on our studio’s approach to modern design.

design.title: Interior Design
design.description: We create interiors that reflect the style, character, and lifestyle of our clients. In our work, we combine aesthetics, functionality, and modern technologies to ensure each project is unique and comfortable.

items.name: Luxury Apartment
items.description:
A sophisticated interior design for a modern apartment.
Features high-end materials and smart home technology.

items.name: Cozy Villa
items.description:
A warm and inviting villa interior.
Designed for comfort and elegance.

contacts.title: Contact Us
contacts.description: Have questions? Want to learn more about our services? Write to us using the form below, and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.
